attributes.action: Stop biased pro EU reporting by the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC consistently use biased news reporting and TV programs to scaremonger and cause unrest regarding Britains exit from the EU. 

This was evident before the referendum and is continuing.

The Victoria Derbyshire program 5th July is suggesting that the migrant border in Calais will be moved to the UK. 

Every day there is another scare report, yet they censor other negative news against the EU. The migrant situation is very rarely reported on.
attributes.background: The BBC is abusing its media power to promote its own political agenda.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which includes complaints about the impartiality of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
